name: charm-abm
description: An ABM of Education using ASX
author: John Vandivier

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-libs && npm run build-models && npm run build-dist && squash dist/AS.js > dist/AS.min.js && squash dist/AS.module.js > dist/AS.module.min.js && npm run build-docs && cp docs/README.md .
scripts.watch: sane 'npm run build-models' './models/src/' & sane 'npm run build-dist' './src/'
